title: Diego Dilemma in the Cookie Conundrum
description: Diego Dilemma loves cookies. What he doesn’t love is that his parents make him earn cookies before eating them. But why?When Diego’s father explains that the reason he has to earn cookies before eating them lies in the extraordinary consequences that could follow eating unearned cookies, Diego isn’t convinced. He would prefer to discover the truth on his own, and maybe have some delicious fun in the process.Join Diego Dilemma in this crumb-filled adventure, as he explores the possibility (and consequences) of trying to take cookies straight from the cookie jar without earning them first.
author: Zachary Fallon
